worldTraits.Name: Large Boulders
worldTraits.Description: Huge boulders make digging through this world more difficult

worldTraits.Name: Medium Boulders
worldTraits.Description: Mid-sized boulders make digging through this world more difficult

worldTraits.Name: Mixed Boulders
worldTraits.Description: Boulders of various sizes make digging through this world more difficult

worldTraits.Name: Small Boulders
worldTraits.Description: Tiny boulders make digging through this world more difficult

worldTraits.Name: Trapped Oil
worldTraits.Description: Most of the Oil in this world will need to be extracted with Oil Wells

worldTraits.Name: Frozen Core
worldTraits.Description: This world has a chilly core of solid Ice

worldTraits.Name: Geoactive
worldTraits.Description: This world has more Geysers and Vents than usual

worldTraits.Name: Geodes
worldTraits.Description: Large geodes containing rare material caches are deposited across this world

worldTraits.Name: Geodormant
worldTraits.Description: This world has fewer Geysers and Vents than usual

worldTraits.Name: Large Glaciers
worldTraits.Description: Huge chunks of primordial Ice are scattered across this world

worldTraits.Name: Magma Channels
worldTraits.Description: The Magma from this world's core has leaked into the mantle and crust

worldTraits.Name: Metal Poor
worldTraits.Description: There is a reduced amount of Metal Ore on this world, proceed with caution!

worldTraits.Name: Metal Rich
worldTraits.Description: This asteroid is an abundant source of Metal Ore

worldTraits.Name: Alternate Pod Location
worldTraits.Description: The Printing Pod didn't end up in the asteroid's exact center this time... but it's still nowhere near the surface

worldTraits.Name: Slime Molds
worldTraits.Description: Sickly Slime growths have crept all over this world

worldTraits.Name: Crashed Satellites
worldTraits.Description: This world contains crashed radioactive satellites

worldTraits.Name: Frozen Friend
worldTraits.Description: This world contains a frozen friend from a long time ago

worldTraits.Name: Irregular Oil
worldTraits.Description: The Oil on this asteroid is anything but regular!

worldTraits.Name: Lush Core
worldTraits.Description: This world has a lush forest core

worldTraits.Name: Metallic Caves
worldTraits.Description: This world has caves of metal ore

worldTraits.Name: Radioactive Crust
worldTraits.Description: Deposits of Uranium Ore are found in this world's crust

worldTraits.Name: Subsurface Ocean
worldTraits.Description: Below the crust of this world is a Salt Water sea

worldTraits.Name: Volcanic Activity
worldTraits.Description: Several active Volcanoes have been detected in this world
